bug.short_desc: Fedora 26 Final build of spin-kickstarts needed
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
We need a build of spin-kickstarts that matches the kickstarts we use to produce the Fedora 26 Final RCs.
Note: please don't do a package build *yet*, as most likely we will want to land one or two changes to fedora-kickstarts before producing the next Final compose:
https://pagure.io/fedora-kickstarts/pull-request/252 https://pagure.io/fedora-kickstarts/pull-request/254
I'll update this bug when I think we're ready for the package build.
This is a Final blocker: "A spin-kickstarts package which contains the exact kickstart files used to build the release must be present in the release repository. The included kickstarts must define the correct set of release repositories."
spin-kickstarts-0.26.1-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-444b101c7b

spin-kickstarts-0.26.1-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-444b101c7b

0.26.1-1.fc26 is definitely in RC-1.5, and I just confirmed the contents are good:
[adamw@adam share]$ diff -ur spin-kickstarts/ /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/ Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: atomic-installer Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: AUTHORS Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: COPYING Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: .git Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: .gitignore Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: l10n Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: Makefile Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: README.md Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: templates Only in /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/: tools [adamw@adam share]$ cd /home/adamw/local/fedora-kickstarts/ [adamw@adam fedora-kickstarts (f26)]$ git status On branch f26 Your branch is up-to-date with 'upstream/f26'. nothing to commit, working tree clean [adamw@adam fedora-kickstarts (f26)]$
spin-kickstarts-0.26.1-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
